entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The Dark Lord is mentioned as speaking and giving orders.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is described as gazing at Voldemort breathless and imploring.

entities.name: severus snape
entities.description: Snape is asked by Voldemort if he recognizes the guest.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: The Death Eaters are mentioned as a group.

entities.name: the dark lord ascending
entities.description: The book 'The Dark Lord Ascending' is mentioned.

relationships.description: Bellatrix gazes at Voldemort breathless and imploring.
Voldemort asks Snape if he recognizes the guest.
The Death Eaters are mentioned as a group led by Voldemort.
Bellatrix looks up to Voldemort with gratitude.
Lucius Malfoy's wand is mentioned as belonging to Voldemort.
Snape is part of the Death Eaters group.
